title: ∞ The Dalrymple Report: Apple Intelligence blunder and Siri is wrong (again)
description: Just when you think it couldn't get any worse, Siri strikes again. Ask Siri, "what month is it?" on your iPhone and you get the reply, "Sorry, I don't understand." Apple's Siri executive held a meeting about the technology and was pretty brutal about the failings Apple has had until now. Oh yeah, Apple Intelligence is delayed, again. Posted on Friday, March 21st, 2025 at 7:44 am. PT

Just when you think it couldn’t get any worse, Siri strikes again. Ask Siri, “what month is it?” on your iPhone and you get the reply, “Sorry, I don’t understand.” Apple’s Siri executive held a meeting about the technology and was pretty brutal about the failings Apple has had until now. Oh yeah, Apple Intelligence is delayed, again.
